txt.en: 'Have you noticed the strange objects around you?\n\n'These primitive trappings are not of Gondor...surely they belong to the Easterling. What a fool to leave such a trail in his wake! Quickly, see if we can find more evidence of his passing, we must find him!'
'These belongings are so scattered, [placeholder]. I cannot discern his whereabouts from so little.\n\n'I must try to remember the time I spent here. Perhaps something has fallen from my memory.'
Doron has noticed strange relics and supplies strewn about the ruins of Ost Celebrant. He believes these to be the belongings of the Easterling that has taken control of the fortress.
Search Ost Celebrant for Easterling belongings ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Doron wishes for you to search for the Easterling's belongings while travelling through Ost Celebrant. He has described them as having a different look than any of the relics of Gondor that still lay in the ruins.
